location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Hamilton, House of Commons to Sir Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: Binding: The minute has been held together using string ties.

mods.abstract: Letter from George Hamilton, Secretary of State for India asking about a telegram he thought Pelly had sent to the Indian Government or Charles Umpherston Aitchison but which he can find no record of it having been sent.
